channel.title: One Thing Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: A conversation with pastors, leaders, professors, and many others on their One thing. The One thing God is leading them to say and do in the world today.
channel.itunes:author: Nathan Wheeler
channel.itunes:summary: A conversation with pastors, leaders, professors, and many others on their One thing. The One thing God is leading them to say and do in the world today.
